Ritual.co | Backend (Java), Mobile, Web, DevOps (GCP+Kubernetes), Product | Toronto, Ontario, Canda | ONSITE, FULL TIME

- Ritual is a technology company that makes a smartphone app which provides instant access to a complete assortment of everyday coffee and food items from local spots - at the push of a button.

- On another level, Ritual is about applying mobile technology, CRM, and world-class operations teams to redefine the way millions of people interact with local businesses everyday.

We just closed a $70M Series C round and are looking to double our engineering team from 20 to 40. We are mostly focusing on intermediate and senior talent. Come help us digitize local commerce!

You can apply at https://ritual.co/careers or email me directly at andrew.potapov@ritual.co
